name: Andron (Bilocation Line Studio)
description:
This is a small non-profit game developed by Bilocation Line Studio.

Andron 

v1.0.0a ALPHA*

Zombie apocalypse?

And it is.
But! (Attention), are you an... android? or... soldier, anyway, you're something that should prove his ability to kill simulated zombies through a zombie killing simulator to then try to save the real world.
You do not use conventional weapons, yours are the war drones (and you have 5 different ones).

This is all FOR NOW.

Probably in the next version you can customize the drones.

Did you see a bug? Let us know!

Do you have a creative suggestion? Let us know!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

C: Crouch

Mouse wheel: Change camera position.

KILL
